title: W10 Issues ( serious post )
body: Ever since the August  W10 update i noticed that my fps went from 80 capped at everything high to 60-45 also a lot of sound problems  also a lot of screen freezes but that doesnt have to do anything with the game apparently cause it happens when i use twitchtv and when my mother uses her little photoshop app  all i'm asking is does anyone else experience fps problems and or sounds issues with his games be it league wow dota anything. I saw a wow forum and a bunch of people also had same issues with way more expencive machinery aswell with a suggestion about turning off a recording program from the xbox app available on w8/w10. FUnny part is the july update causes my mice to mulfuction all 3 of them (they arent expencive dont call me a spoiled cuck) whilist the AUGUST uypdate caused major FPS issues and a lot of crashes.

replies.body:
So, did you end up disabling the xbox app game DVR that the latest windows update forced or nah?
Because I was having the above issues and doing that actually solved it for me.
I used this vid to get it done:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sU6DFUgBE4g&feature=youtu.be

indeed this fixed the problems regarding the games, now i'm still on the lookout for any freezes cause those occured outside the game aswell . simply by browsing ( btw at the time i posted this i was in bed and i did it with a tablet thus why i didnt post my results. ) Also ty for the video i already knew how to do it but still you took time to post it many thanks

No prob^^ glad it helped a little.
Yeah Windows 10 has a lot of things that are annoying; would be a nice OS too if we didn't have to fight with it all the time.  
As for the freezes outside the game I'm not sure what's causing them.  I've had to spend a lot of time force uninstalling windows 10 features by going through folders/deleting stuff I just wish they'd ask before putting stuff on our comps.
At one time Cortana was causing the freezes so I got rid of her, and then the  search windows bar was acting up so I got rid of that.

Best thing would be to look at what's eating a lot of memory on your process list during the time near the freezes and then to google that to see if you can find a lead.  Be super careful and cross-reference stuff though since force-uninstalling stuff is dangerous.
(gotta say this; you likely already know why though)

Yeah W10 has only caused me problems tbh. i switched to them after friends reccomendation but i only had a stable patch since june. After june i had hardware problems and now with the august patch i had that shit DVR turned on or w/e its called without my permission ofc (that's what i hate about w10).. and those freezes seem to be fixed atm im using the machine for around 2-3 hours atm no freezes occured so i'm kinda happy for now. All ik is the next Bs that occurs from one of the w10 patches i'm going back to 7. I dont really use it for work anyway no need for all these apps' i just Search up google for recipes play a bit of league and let my mom play her little photoshop game. Again thank you for your time much apreciated. <3

Yeah, I'm always annoyed at the updates too; wish it was optional.
Anyhow, I'm happy for you that the freezes are gone and I hope they stay that way.
Since we seem to be having the same problems each update don't hesitate to give me a holler if something happens; I probably went through it too^^  See you 'round~

You may have outdated drivers or corrupt game files, but yeah it could be a hardware issue too.  To rule out possibilities, go over the instructions in our game [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC.  Hopefully, this will get you all fixed up!
i fixed the problems regarding the game now the only issue im looking for is if any random freezes appear ty for your time my friend
